title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions: a. Warp: 200cm (78 3/4in.). Weft: 71cm (28in.). b. Warp: 199cm (78 1/2in.). Weft: 71cm (28in.). Both selvedges present in both pieces.
description: Alternation of two stripes. The wider stripe scrolls and flowers in red, gold, green and black on white. The narrower stripe scrolls in black and gold on purple.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. 1974-57-7-a,b.
